Package com.esri.mo2.ui.dnd

Provides classes and interfaces for data Drag and Drop on the Map component.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DndHandler The DndHandler interface is to define a generic way to handle the operations of draging a data type and droping it on the Map component or a component referencing Map object in the MapObject Java.
 

Class Summary
BaseDndHandler Provides a simple implementation for the DndHandler interface.
ContentDndHandler Handles the drag and drop process for all supported contents types.
ContentFlavor defines the DataFlavor that can be obtained by drag-and-drop from the Catalog
Contents this is a thin wrapper for an array of Content objects, which is the result of calling CatalogTree.getSelectionData().
ContentTransferable this is the class that contains results for drag-n-drop from the Catalog as well as the result of DatasetChooser
DndManager Defines a drag and drop generic framework associating with a component.
FileDndHandler The FileDndHandler deals with a file drag and drop from a native system (e.g.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.ui.dnd Description

Provides classes and interfaces for data Drag and Drop on the Map component.
